education: Data transferred from Atlez's mind; mentored by Adam Warlock
identity: true nature unknown to general public
knownrelatives: Brian Langunn (father), Debby Langunn (mother), Ruby Langunn (sister)
powers: Atleza anchors reality in place, preventing it from being pulled into and destroyed by the Infinity Abyss. She has limited ability to affect events within reality. Her powers will likely increase with age.
